Uses of Interface
framework.events.MouseControl

  • Packages that use MouseControl 
    Package Description
    framework.core
    Contains the main-functionality of the framework.
    framework.objects
    All objects available to draw, update, click, drag and so on.

    • Uses of MouseControl in framework.core

      Methods in framework.core with parameters of type MouseControl 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Application.addMouseControl(MouseControl control)
      Adds the mouse control to the listeners of the canvas.
      void Application.removeMouseControl(MouseControl control)
      Removes the mouse control from the listeners of the canvas.

    • Uses of MouseControl in framework.objects

      Classes in framework.objects that implement MouseControl 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Circle
      A circle that can be manipulated and that draws itself on a canvas.
      class  Picture
      The Class Picture that can be used for drawing custom images.
      class  Rectangle
      The Class Rectangle that is used to draw colored rectangles, receive events, check collision and so on.
      class  Square
      A square that can be manipulated and that draws itself on a canvas.
      class  Triangle
      A triangle that can be manipulated and that draws itself on a canvas.
